com.networknt.portal.usermanagement.auth.model.user

Class ConfirmationToken<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.networknt.portal.usermanagement.auth.model.user.ConfirmationToken<P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity<Long,ConfirmationToken<P>>

    public class ConfirmationToken<P>
extends Object
implements Entity<Long,ConfirmationToken<P>>
    Confirmation token functions as a one-time password for being able to perform operations like email change and password reset.
